jobDescription: Position: Data AnalystPay Rate: 40.00HR W2Location: Bothell, WA 98021Hours: Full Time, 8AM-5PM, M-FDescription: For this position we are looking for an experienced data analyst. The analyst is part of the Sonicare connected platform team and supports the Platform product manager and Venture lead in driving the right improvements to meet the key performance indicators set for the Connected Platform.ResponsibilitiesAnalyzing large IoT data streams using multiple reporting systems including Adobe Marketing CloudReporting on KPIs to senior managementDriving incremental product improvement recommendations based on data analysisProviding input to product manager on new feature developmentSupporting global markets with ad-hoc local data support requestsDeep dive on platform quality issues and recommending focus items for quality improvement sprintsSupport of the Platform new value space initiative with structural and ad-hoc analysisParticipates in Resource Planning Events to support planning for sprints for product developmentQualifications:3+ years of experience in data analytics roleExperience in data analytics environment, with IoT background a plusFamiliarity with working in a Safe Agile Framework (SAFE) environmentExperience in global business environment and working in multinational/global teamsExcellent analytical skillsCollaborative mindsetProficient in working with Adobe Marketing Cloud, Microsoft Excel and Powerpoint.College degree preferred.Must pass a background check and drug test.
